definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: The policeman nailed the suspect with a flying tackle.
sentences.chinese: 警察飞身上前，一把抱住了嫌疑犯。

sentences.english: The flying keeper clawed it away from the top right-hand corner.
sentences.chinese: 守门员飞身将球扑出大门右角。

sentences.english: The policeman brought the thief to the ground with a flying tackle.
sentences.chinese: 警察飞身上前把盗贼扑倒在地上。

sentences.english: I fly threw himself into his mothers arms, tightly holding the mother.
sentences.chinese: 我飞身扑进了妈妈的怀里，紧紧地抱着妈妈。

sentences.english: I fly threw himself into his mothers arms tightly holding the mother.
sentences.chinese: 我飞身扑进了妈妈的怀里，紧紧地抱着妈妈。

sentences.english: She soused down into the river.

definition: be high up in the sky
to jump up suddenly/to bound up/to rise up in one bound
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to get out of the way
to charge/to pounce on/to swoop down on
